layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x98
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x98
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,13) size 784x77
      LayoutBlockFlow {PRE} at (0,0) size 784x20 [border: (2px solid #008000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 136x16
          text run at (2,2) width 136: "I am on one line."
          text run at (138,2) width 0: " "
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,33) size 784x44 [border: (2px solid #008000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 758x39
          text run at (2,2) width 0: " "
          text run at (2,22) width 758: "This div is two lines.  The newline right after the tag opened is significant and is honored by Firefox and Opera (and us)."
          text run at (760,22) width 0: " "
